p: Growth characteristics of the screened PK15 cells. The screened PK15 cells were passaged to the 60 th generation; each generation of the cells was collected and stored in liquid nitrogen. The cells that were passaged to the 60 th generation were thawed, and the growth curves of these cells were tracked using cell counting at 4, 8, 12, 24, 36, and 48 h post seeding. Six replications at each time point were set and the parent PK15 cells were used as control cells.
